basic_static_string::find_first_not_of (5 of 5 overloads)

Find the first occurrence of a character not equal to c.

Synopsis 
constexpr size_type
find_first_not_of(
    value_type c,
    size_type pos = 0) const;
Description

Finds the first occurrence of a character that is not equal to c.

Complexity

Linear.

Return Value

The index corrosponding to the first character of {begin() + pos, end()) that is not equal to c if it exists, and npos otherwise.

Parameters

Name

Description

c

The character to ignore.

pos

The index to start searching at. The default argument for this parameter is 0.
